mean_cn: n. 挂锁，关闭，禁止进入；  v. 用挂锁锁上，关闭
mean_en: a strong lock with a curved bar that connects to the main part of the lock and holds together two parts of something (such as a chain or a gate)
word_etyma: pad步行 + lock锁 → padlock 挂锁，禁止进入
sentence: I put a padlock on my journal so nobody can read my secrets!
sentence_trans: 我在日记上加了挂锁，这样就没人能看到我的秘密了！
